trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual child controls of containers that implement <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 公開方法與屬性，以支援使用者介面自動化用戶端存取個別子控制項的容器實作<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern>控制項模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示容器的可見區域 (viewport) 中的控制項捲動內容區域的容器物件。

trans-unit.source: This method does not provide the ability to specify the position of the control within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會提供讓您指定可見區域 (viewport) 的容器內控制項的位置。

trans-unit.source: The item cannot be scrolled into view.
